mapper.select: SELECT stock_request_id, s.name as shop_name, request_date, admin_approval FROM stock_request sr JOIN shop s ON sr.shop_id = s.shop_id

SELECT stock_request_id, s.name as shop_name, request_date, admin_approval FROM stock_request sr JOIN shop s ON sr.shop_id = s.shop_id JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.employee_number = #{employee_number}

SELECT sr.stock_request_id, s.name as shop_name, request_date, e.name as employee_name, admin_approval, sr.product_id, p.name as product_name, amount FROM stock_request sr JOIN product p ON sr.product_id = p.product_id JOIN shop s ON sr.shop_id = s.shop_id JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE sr.stock_request_id = #{id}

SELECT sr.stock_request_id, s.name as shop_name, request_date, e.name as employee_name, admin_approval, sr.product_id, p.name as product_name, amount FROM stock_request sr JOIN product p ON sr.product_id = p.product_id JOIN shop s ON sr.shop_id = s.shop_id JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE sr.stock_request_id = #{id} and e.employee_number = #{employee_number}
mapper.update: UPDATE stock_request sr JOIN shop s ON sr.shop_id = s.shop_id JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id SET approval='승인' WHERE stock_request_id = #{id} and e.employee_number = #{employee_number}
